4-2-5 Cover 1.q: What is the coverage structure in 4-2-5 Cover 1?
4-2-5 Cover 1.a: Cover 1 Man-Free with a deep-middle FS.
Mike and Will in man coverage.
Maintain gap integrity — no stunt or blitz.
RB motion (man indicator), QB eyes (predicts throw), TE motion (assigns LB coverage)

4-2-5 Cover 1.q: What offensive concepts should you expect?
4-2-5 Cover 1.a: Four Verticals (stresses deep middle), Mesh (uses rubs vs man), Zone Read (stresses backside DE and LB eye discipline)

4-2-5 Cover 2.q: What do the corners do in Cover 2?
4-2-5 Cover 2.a: Jam and sink to flats (cloud technique).

4-2-5 Cover 2.q: What offensive concepts should you expect?
4-2-5 Cover 2.a: Smash (attacks CB/flat stress), Stick (attacks hook/curl defenders), Screens (force fast trigger from corners)

4-2-5 Cover 4.q: What offensive concepts should you expect?
4-2-5 Cover 4.a: Smash (stresses corners in Quarters), Four Verts (stresses safeties), Mesh (forces passing of routes in zone match rules)

Cover 1 Badger.q: What do Mike and Will do?
Cover 1 Badger.a: One blitzes B-Gap; the other plays QB spy.
Eyes on man in coverage; Identify blitz LB based on RB alignment

Cover 1 Badger.q: What offensive concepts should you expect?
Cover 1 Badger.a: Mesh rub routes vs man, Stick isolates LB on RB, Screens punish man eyes

Nipsey 2 Trap.q: What does the Field Corner do?
Nipsey 2 Trap.a: Plays trap technique (bait → jump underneath routes).

Nipsey 2 Trap.q: What do Mike and Will show pre-snap?
Nipsey 2 Trap.a: Double Mug in both A-Gaps, then drop to curls.
#2 WR to each side; QB eyes from zone defenders

Nipsey 2 Trap.q: What offensive concepts should you expect?
Nipsey 2 Trap.a: Smash (trap attempts to steal corner route), Stick (LB must match #2), Screens (nickel blitz affects perimeter)

Waylon 3 Fire.a: Rolls down to weak flat to replace blitzer.
Blitz side identification; Zone eyes for off-ball defenders

Waylon 3 Fire.q: What offensive concepts should you expect?
Waylon 3 Fire.a: Smash (stresses deep third defender), Mesh (crosses occupy hook/flat drops), 4 Verts (seam players expand to cover 3 lane)
